item.title: Submissions
item.description: What can be learned here: defining a basic <fx-submission> triggering a submission by using <fx-send> action replacing data with submission sending a message to the user with <fx-message> action Ok, nice - we have a todo list that will be gone when we reload the browser or leave the page. Make tutorial part 1 Pick up Milk new task Todo add You have {count(instance()/task[@complete='true'])} completed tasks delete Adding a submission We need a way to store our data.
